text: these fans got a preview of india's
first Formula One track the booth
international circuit outside Delhi
which opens officially at the end of
October the 5.1 4 kilometer track has
the fastest straight-line speed of any
circuit in the world supporting speeds
up to 325 km/h there are several wide
turns which make it easy for the f1
drivers to cause a thrill factor for
fans and the uphill turns and elevation
changes make the track all the more
challenging the stands painted in the
colours of the indian national flag
offer views of three or four corners but
with the opening race just days away the
track is unfinished safety measures like
rubber tires lining the track to
minimize the impact of a crash are still
missing the organisers compared the
state of to an Indian organizers are
aware that their progress is being
closely monitored especially after the
widely publicized rush to get ready for
